attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To ask that Gordon Brown calls an election now! The past few months have shown this government to be, out of touch, out of ideas and out to destoy this country by clinging on to power.

WE CAN'T HAVE A VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE, BUT THE GOVERNMENT CAN DO THE DECENT THING, CALL AN ELECTION, SEE IF THE COUNTRY IS BEHIND IT.

If only the government could be lost as easy as OUR data, then we could move to be GREAT BRITIAN once again.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
